means: [人名] [北方英格兰人姓氏] 特沃德尔 Tweddell的变体

sentence.Network_en: For such views or criticisms, which are not based on thorough investigation, are nothing but ignorant twaddle.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为这种议论或批评, 没有经过周密调查, 不过是无知妄说.

sentence.Network_en: Don't try to palm off that twaddle about the Cause to me.
sentence.Network_cn: 请不要拿出什么主义之类的废话来跟我胡聊了.

sentence.Network_en: This is all hopeless twaddle that I am saying about her.
sentence.Network_cn: 我这样说她,那是全无希望的拙劣废话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: swaddle 束缚twaddle 废话(２)加二联想
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... saddle 鞍，马鞍 twaddle 胡说八道，瞎扯 piddle 拖塌地处理（工作）.

list.abs: I ' ve never heard such utter twaddle !, 别说这种荒唐话了!
I ' ve never heard such utter twaddle !, 我还从来没听过这么愚蠢透顶的话!

twaddle's是什么意思... ... nathan twaddle1.  奈斯安·提瓦德尔 twaddle's hydrometer1. 特沃德尔比重计 twaddle1.  废话.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: alteration of earlier twattle, of unknown origin

entry.def: If you refer to something that someone says as twaddle, you mean that it is silly or untrue.

means.word_mean: 1. pretentious or silly talk or writing
1. speak (about unimportant matters) rapidly and incessantly

auth_sentence.content: We should be inflicted with less...twaddle and useless verbosity.
auth_sentence.res_content: We should be inflicted with less...twaddle and useless verbosity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We should be inflicted with less...twaddle and useless verbosity.

auth_sentence.content: Guided by...experience, and not by the twaddle of theorists.
auth_sentence.res_content: Guided by...experience, and not by the twaddle of theorists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Guided by...experience, and not by the twaddle of theorists.

auth_sentence.content: Georgie hated dinner parties;...people talked twaddle and wasted one's time.
auth_sentence.res_content: Georgie hated dinner parties;...people talked twaddle and wasted one's time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Georgie hated dinner parties;...people talked twaddle and wasted one's time.

sentences.en: I’ve never heard such utter twaddle!
sentences.cn: 我还从来没听过这么愚蠢透顶的话!
